author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
One issue we faced during our implementation of the ceremony was that the initial data was incorrect (all powers were just set to the generator, thus the duplicated pubkey check failed)
I've added a correct test case here: https://github.com/dknopik/towers-of-pau/tree/main/testcases
We use 1, 2, 3, 4 as secrets for the 4 different transcript, thus we can pass the duplicated pubkey check.
I will add some more interesting test cases soon ™️  cc <@550420431744794624>

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: (the first transcript only contains the generators as secret 1 will produce the same point in all different powers)
